s: Luxardo is Italy’s premier liqueur and cocktail cherry producer, creating essential ingredients for modern and classic cocktails. Luxardo Maraschino Cherries are dark and decadent with the rich flavor of real sour Marasca cherries, candied fresh.

Founded in 1821 by Girolamo Luxardo, the company is famous for producing Sambuca as well as a wide range of other Italian liqueurs and baking ingredients – their maraschino cherries are a must have for any cocktail fan.
